column1: Highlights: Cutting-edge 4G network – Share internet access with up to 32 Wi-Fi devices and enjoy download speeds of up to 150 Mbps
Plug a SIM card and play – No configurations needed
column2: compatibility of SIM cards in 100+ countries are assured by years of field tests

column1: Two detachable advanced LTE antennas – Enjoy stable and efficient connections to every device thanks to the two external antennas
Wi-Fi router mode – Plug an Ethernet cable into the LAN/WAN port for flexible access if you can't get a 4G connection
Content Notes: Actual network speed may be limited by the rate of the product's Ethernet WAN or LAN port
column2: the rate supported by the network cable
column3: Internet service provider factors and other environmental conditions.
